---
title: "Call for papers"
---
  
All works that have used the R programming language in their methodology are welcome. The works may be presented through talks or posters.

## Steps
The submission of works will be done through the CMT platform. Below are the steps to submit a work:

1. Visit [this link](https://cmt3.research.microsoft.com/User/Login){target="\_blank"} and create an account or membership.
2. Visit [this link](https://cmt3.research.microsoft.com/RDay2025){target="\_blank"} to access the work submission system.
3. Click the **Create new submission** button.
4. Enter the title, a summary of <span style="color: red;">1000 characters</span>, and the authors.
5. Choose whether it is a talk or a poster.
6. Click the **Submit** button to submit your work.

Once your work has been submitted, you must wait until the notification date (acceptance or rejection). The dates can be found [at this link](dates.html).
